tossup_question: -   –  What immunoglobulin class is the largest antibody present in the human circulatory system?
bonus_question: -   –  A scientist isolates a small amount of DNA from a Tyrannosaur fossil. Which of the following would be most useful for increasing the amount of DNA with which the scientist has to work?
bonus_MCQoptions:
W)RFLP analysis
X)Polymerase chain reaction
Y)Southern blotting
Z)SDS-PAGE
